Neteller and Skrill no longer available in country

Neteller and Skrill have announced that they will no longer be available in country. This means you will not see Neteller and Skrill for deposits or withdrawals in the Deriv cashier.

Your account and funds on Deriv are safe and unaffected by this.

If youâ€™ve only been using Neteller or Skrill to fund your Deriv account, you may no longer see any options available in the withdrawal section of our cashier page.

Hereâ€™s how to enable a new payment method for both deposits and withdrawals.

Enable a new payment method

1. Log in to your account and select your real money account. Then, go to Cashier and click on Deposit.

For Binary.com:

For Deriv:

2. Choose a new payment method from the list and make a minimum deposit into your Deriv account.

Please note that withdrawals via cards are restricted in some countries; you may need to use an e-wallet service.

3. If the deposit is successful, youâ€™ll be able to see that method in the withdrawal screen and make withdrawals using the new payment method from here on.

Please let us know if youâ€™re having trouble adding a new payment method; weâ€™re here to help.
